inline:
.
a *some emphasis* **some bold** b
c :role:`content` d
e ``literal`` f
g Reference_ h
i `a Phrase`_ j
k `text <ref_>`_ l
m anonymous__ n
o _`Target` p
q |sub| r
s [1]_ [#]_ [*]_ t
u [CIT2002]_ v
w http://a.net/ x
y `uri <a.org>`_ z

.. __: anonymous-target

.. [1] normal footnote
.. [#] auto-number footnote.
.. [*] auto-symbol footnote.
.. [a] citation footnote
   next line

   new paragraph
.
<document source="source">
    <paragraph>
        a 
        <emphasis>
            some emphasis
         
        <strong>
            some bold
         b
        c 
        <RoleNode role="role" text="content">
         d
        e 
        <literal>
            literal
         f
        g 
        <reference name="Reference" refname="reference">
            Reference
         h
        i 
        <reference name="a Phrase" refname="a phrase">
            a Phrase
         j
        k 
        <reference embedded="True" name="text" refname="ref">
            text
         l
        m 
        <reference anonymous="1" name="anonymous" refuri="anonymous-target">
            anonymous
         n
        o 
        <target ids="target" inline="True" names="target">
            Target
         p
        q 
        <substitution_reference refname="sub">
            sub
         r
        s 
        <footnote_reference ids="footnote-reference-1" refid="footnote-1">
            1
         
        <footnote_reference auto="1" ids="footnote-reference-2" refid="footnote-2">
            2
         
        <footnote_reference auto="*" ids="footnote-reference-3" refid="footnote-3">
            *
         t
        u 
        <citation_reference ids="citation-reference-1" refname="cit2002">
            CIT2002
         v
        w 
        <reference refuri="http://a.net/" standalone_uri="True">
            http://a.net/
         x
        y 
        <reference embedded="True" name="uri" refuri="a.org">
            uri
         z
    <target anonymous="1" ids="target-1" refuri="anonymous-target">
    <footnote backrefs="footnote-reference-1" ids="footnote-1" names="1">
        <paragraph>
            normal footnote
    <footnote auto="1" backrefs="footnote-reference-2" ids="footnote-2" names="2">
        <paragraph>
            auto-number footnote.
    <footnote auto="*" backrefs="footnote-reference-3" ids="footnote-3">
        <paragraph>
            auto-symbol footnote.
    <citation ids="a" names="a">
        <paragraph>
            citation footnote
            next line
        <paragraph>
            new paragraph
.

role-backslash:
.
:math:`\sigma`
.
<document source="source">
    <paragraph>
        <RoleNode role="math" text="\sigma">
.

titles:
.
header 1
========

header 2a
---------

header 3
........

header 2b
---------

.
<document source="source">
    <section ids="header-1" names="header\ 1">
        <title level="1">
            header 1
        <section ids="header-2a" names="header\ 2a">
            <title level="2">
                header 2a
            <section ids="header-3" names="header\ 3">
                <title level="3">
                    header 3
        <section ids="header-2b" names="header\ 2b">
            <title level="2">
                header 2b
.

targets:
.
.. _Python: http://www.python.org/

.. _example:

This is an example cross-reference target.
.
<document source="source">
    <target ids="python" names="python" refuri="http://www.python.org/">
    <target refid="example">
    <paragraph ids="example" names="example">
        This is an example cross-reference target.
.

roles:
.
:a:`b` :c:`d` `f`:e:
:xyz:`123`
.
<document source="source">
    <paragraph>
        <RoleNode role="a" text="b">
         
        <RoleNode role="c" text="d">
         
        <RoleNode role="e" text="f">
        
        <RoleNode role="xyz" text="123">
.

directive-eval-rst:
.
.. name:: argument

.. xyz::
  :opt: value

.. lmp::

   content

   .. sdf::

      other

.. hij:: argument
    :opt: value1
    :opt2: value2

.. hij:: argument
    :opt: value1
    :opt2: value2

    content

.
<document source="source">
    <EvalRstNode indent="0" name="name">
        .. name:: argument
    <EvalRstNode indent="2" name="xyz">
        .. xyz::
          :opt: value
    <EvalRstNode indent="3" name="lmp">
        .. lmp::
        
           content
        
           .. sdf::
        
              other
    <EvalRstNode indent="4" name="hij">
        .. hij:: argument
            :opt: value1
            :opt2: value2
    <EvalRstNode indent="4" name="hij">
        .. hij:: argument
            :opt: value1
            :opt2: value2
        
            content

.

directive-admonition:
.

.. admonition:: Abc *d*
   :class: xyz
   :name: df

   A *b*

   .. note::

     lmn

.. note::

    .. tip::

        Content

    .. unknown:: arg_block

        content
.
<document source="source">
    <DirectiveNode conversion="parse_all" module="docutils.parsers.rst.directives.admonitions.Admonition" name="admonition" options_list="('class',\ 'xyz') ('name',\ 'df')">
        <ArgumentNode>
            Abc 
            <emphasis>
                d
        <ContentNode>
            <paragraph>
                A 
                <emphasis>
                    b
            <DirectiveNode conversion="parse_content" module="docutils.parsers.rst.directives.admonitions.Note" name="note" options_list="">
                <ContentNode>
                    <paragraph>
                        lmn
    <DirectiveNode conversion="parse_content" module="docutils.parsers.rst.directives.admonitions.Note" name="note" options_list="">
        <ContentNode>
            <DirectiveNode conversion="parse_content" module="docutils.parsers.rst.directives.admonitions.Tip" name="tip" options_list="">
                <ContentNode>
                    <paragraph>
                        Content
            <EvalRstNode indent="4" name="unknown">
                .. unknown:: arg_block
                
                    content

.

transition:
.
----
.
<document source="source">
    <transition>
.

front-matter:
.
:Authors:
    Tony J. (Tibs) Ibbs,
    David Goodger

    (and sundry other good-natured folks)

:Version: 1.0 of 2001/08/08
:Dedication: To my father.
:orphan:
.
<document source="source">
    <FrontMatterNode>
        <field>
            <field_name>
                Authors
            <field_body>
                <paragraph>
                    Tony J. (Tibs) Ibbs,
                    David Goodger
                <paragraph>
                    (and sundry other good-natured folks)
        <field>
            <field_name>
                Version
            <field_body>
                <paragraph>
                    1.0 of 2001/08/08
        <field>
            <field_name>
                Dedication
            <field_body>
                <paragraph>
                    To my father.
        <field>
            <field_name>
                orphan
            <field_body>
.

full:
.
.. _a-link:

title
=====

`a-link`_

sub-title
---------

:abc:`xyz`

.. abc:: x
    :a: b

    abc

.. xyz:: lkjhlkj

|x|

.. |name| replace:: replacement *text*

.. |caution| image:: warning.png
             :alt: Warning!

a
  b

.. This is a comment.

- a
- b

  * c

1. a
2. b

   1. c

.. [#f1] Text of the first footnote.

.. [Ref] Book or article reference, URL or whatever.

:fieldname a: Field content

Block quotes are just:

    Indented

    paragraphs

        and they
        may nest.

        -- attribution

    - with
    - bullet list

    1. with
    2. enumerated list
.
<document source="source">
    <target refid="a-link">
    <section ids="title a-link" names="title a-link">
        <title level="1">
            title
        <paragraph>
            <reference name="a-link" refname="a-link">
                a-link
        <section ids="sub-title" names="sub-title">
            <title level="2">
                sub-title
            <paragraph>
                <RoleNode role="abc" text="xyz">
            <EvalRstNode indent="4" name="abc">
                .. abc:: x
                    :a: b
                
                    abc
            <EvalRstNode indent="0" name="xyz">
                .. xyz:: lkjhlkj
            <paragraph>
                <substitution_reference refname="x">
                    x
            <substitution_definition names="name">
                <DirectiveNode conversion="parse_content" module="docutils.parsers.rst.directives.misc.Replace" name="replace" options_list="">
                    <ContentNode>
                        <paragraph>
                            replacement 
                            <emphasis>
                                text
            <substitution_definition names="caution">
                <DirectiveNode conversion="direct" module="docutils.parsers.rst.directives.images.Image" name="image" options_list="('alt',\ 'Warning!')">
                    <ArgumentNode>
                        warning.png
            <definition_list>
                <definition_list_item>
                    <term>
                        a
                    <definition>
                        <paragraph>
                            b
            <comment xml:space="preserve">
                This is a comment.
            <bullet_list bullet="-">
                <list_item prefix="- " style="bullet">
                    <paragraph>
                        a
                <list_item prefix="- " style="bullet">
                    <paragraph>
                        b
                    <bullet_list bullet="*">
                        <list_item prefix="* " style="bullet">
                            <paragraph>
                                c
            <enumerated_list enumtype="arabic" prefix="" suffix=".">
                <list_item prefix="1. " style="enumerated">
                    <paragraph>
                        a
                <list_item prefix="2. " style="enumerated">
                    <paragraph>
                        b
                    <enumerated_list enumtype="arabic" prefix="" suffix=".">
                        <list_item prefix="1. " style="enumerated">
                            <paragraph>
                                c
            <footnote auto="1" ids="f1" names="f1">
                <paragraph>
                    Text of the first footnote.
            <citation ids="ref" names="ref">
                <paragraph>
                    Book or article reference, URL or whatever.
            <field_list>
                <field>
                    <field_name>
                        fieldname a
                    <field_body>
                        <paragraph>
                            Field content
            <paragraph>
                Block quotes are just:
            <block_quote>
                <paragraph>
                    Indented
                <paragraph>
                    paragraphs
                <block_quote>
                    <paragraph>
                        and they
                        may nest.
                    <attribution>
                        attribution
                <bullet_list bullet="-">
                    <list_item prefix="- " style="bullet">
                        <paragraph>
                            with
                    <list_item prefix="- " style="bullet">
                        <paragraph>
                            bullet list
                <enumerated_list enumtype="arabic" prefix="" suffix=".">
                    <list_item prefix="1. " style="enumerated">
                        <paragraph>
                            with
                    <list_item prefix="2. " style="enumerated">
                        <paragraph>
                            enumerated list

.

tables-simple:
.
=====  =====  =======
     AB1      C1
------------  -------
A2     B2     C2
=====  =====  =======
False  False  False
True   False  False
False  True   False
True   True   True
=====  =====  =======
.
<document source="source">
    <table>
        <tgroup cols="3">
            <colspec colwidth="5">
            <colspec colwidth="5">
            <colspec colwidth="7">
            <thead>
                <row>
                    <entry morecols="1">
                    <entry>
                <row>
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            A2
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            B2
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            C2
            <tbody>
                <row>
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            False
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            False
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            False
                <row>
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            True
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            False
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            False
                <row>
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            False
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            True
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            False
                <row>
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            True
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            True
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            True

.

tables-grid:
.
+------------------------+------------+----------+----------+
| Header row, column 1   | Header 2   | Header 3 | Header 4 |
| (header rows optional) |            |          |          |
+========================+============+==========+==========+
| body row 1, column 1   | col 1,2    | col 1,3  | col 1,4  |
+------------------------+------------+----------+----------+
| body row 2             | col 2,2    | col 2,3  | col 2,4  |
+------------------------+------------+----------+----------+
.
<document source="source">
    <table>
        <tgroup cols="4">
            <colspec colwidth="24">
            <colspec colwidth="12">
            <colspec colwidth="10">
            <colspec colwidth="10">
            <thead>
                <row>
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            Header row, column 1
                            (header rows optional)
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            Header 2
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            Header 3
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            Header 4
            <tbody>
                <row>
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            body row 1, column 1
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            col 1,2
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            col 1,3
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            col 1,4
                <row>
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            body row 2
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            col 2,2
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            col 2,3
                    <entry>
                        <paragraph>
                            col 2,4
.
